name: SMITE x TMNT Starter Pass
description:
The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles join SMITE, the #1 MOBA on Xbox.

Cowabunga! The classic animated heroes in a half shell join the Battlegrounds in a far-out crossover. This radical Battle Pass features community-loved Gods as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Osiris Leonardo, Donatello Sun Wukong, Raphael Loki, and Michelangelo Mercury.

Get a head start unlocking the world's most fearsome fighting team in the all-new Battle Pass with the SMITE x TMNT Starter Pass, FREE for all Game Pass Ultimate Subscribers. The TMNT Starter Pass includes 3,000 Battle Pass Points, the four Gods featured in the Battle Pass, and their Voice Packs. Plus: unlock a Daily Deal bundle of your choice, containing three great cosmetics chosen just for you.

Includes: - 3,000 Battle Pass Points - Loki, Sun Wukong, Mercury, Osiris and their Voice Packs - Daily Deal Token

This offer does not include the TMNT Premium Battle Pass. Visit the Deals tab in the Store to redeem your Daily Deal Token.
